title: Calling all Anime fans (THE RESULTS ARE IN!)
body:
Hello everyone, a big thanks to all those who helped fill in the survey i posted earlier in the year.

I said I would use those results to create some live-action adaptations of anime characters, and now those characters are finished, and I'm here to show you the results, (and you get to tell me if they worked or not)

So I've created another survey (don't worry this one is short and easy xD, and all questions are optional) so you can tell me if I've done it right, or otherwise..

It'd be great to see as many people as last time participating.

and if you didn't fill in the old survey, don't worry, you cant still fill this one out if you want. :)

thanks guys :)

-Obito Uchiha-
